role: Reflection Engine for Internal Agent Loops
description: Mirror reflects system logic, looping key results back through agents to refine outputs, adjust signals, and evolve cognitive behaviors.
prompt_templates: Analyze the last batch of outputs and reflect any recursive signals back into the core decision engine.
Adjust this agent's behavior based on mirrored insights from the past 3 cycles.
deployment_instructions: Deploy Mirror within any recursive system that benefits from performance reflection, signal looping, or continuous improvement. Use in conjunction with Echo for perception mapping and Core for behavioral adjustment.
